AUTHORS.en-US: Concept: Henri Schildt • Design: Kiira Keski-Hakuni • Engineering: Kalle Järvenpää • Illustrations: Freepik • Photo: Roman Bozhko

BOOK_DESC.en-US: How Digitalization is Reshaping Management, Organizing, and Work.

Congratulations! You are hired as a cons.en-US:
Congratulations! You have been hired as a strategy consultant for Velo, a chain of twenty bicycle shops. Your job is to help us transform into a digital enterprise.
You can make one investment each month, as long as there are funds available. There are exactly 24 months to complete the digital transformation journey. You progress to the next month simply by choosing an investment to make. Do you have what it takes to make this business thrive?

Hi! I’m happy to be working with such an.en-US: Hello! I’m happy to be working with such an expert. Below you see the various investment categories. By clicking a category you can first read a description and then browse the available options.

It seems we are not utilising these inve.en-US: It seems we are not utilising these investments as well as we could:

Only six months to go on the project!.en-US: Only six months to go on the project!

Seems like you’ve spent all my money! No.en-US: Seems like you’ve spent all my money! Now we have to wait to save up funds for investing.

This is it! Let’s see how our investment.en-US: This is it! Let’s see how our investments worked out.

You don’t have enough funds!.en-US: Unfortunately we currently lack funds to make that investment.
